02070                                     struct mgs_device *mgs,
02071                                     struct fs_db *fsdb,
02072                                     struct mgs_target_info *mti,
02073                                     int mdt_index, char *logname)
02074 {
02075         struct llog_handle      *llh = NULL;
02076         char    *nodeuuid = NULL;
02077         char    *ospname = NULL;
02078         char    *lovuuid = NULL;
02079         char    *mdtuuid = NULL;
02080         char    *svname = NULL;
02081         char    *mdtname = NULL;
02082         char    *lovname = NULL;
02083         char    index_str[16];
02084         char    nidstr[LNET_NIDSTR_SIZE];
02085         int     i, rc;
02086 
02087         ENTRY;
02088         if (mgs_log_is_empty(env, mgs, mti->mti_svname)) {
02089                 CERROR("log is empty! Logical error\n");
02090                 RETURN (-EINVAL);
02091         }
02092 
02093         CDEBUG(D_MGS, "adding osp index %d to %s\n", mti->mti_stripe_index,
02094                logname);
02095 
02096         rc = name_create_mdt(&mdtname, fsdb->fsdb_name, mti->mti_stripe_index);
02097         if (rc)
02098                 RETURN(rc);
02099 
02100         libcfs_nid2str_r(mti->mti_nids[0], nidstr, sizeof(nidstr));
02101         rc = name_create(&nodeuuid, nidstr, "");
02102         if (rc)
02103                 GOTO(out_destory, rc);
02104 
02105         rc = name_create(&svname, mdtname, "-osp");
02106         if (rc)
02107                 GOTO(out_destory, rc);
02108 
02109         sprintf(index_str, "-MDT%04x", mdt_index);
02110         rc = name_create(&ospname, svname, index_str);
02111         if (rc)
02112                 GOTO(out_destory, rc);
02113 
02114         rc = name_create_lov(&lovname, logname, fsdb, mdt_index);
02115         if (rc)
02116                 GOTO(out_destory, rc);
02117 
02118         rc = name_create(&lovuuid, lovname, "_UUID");
02119         if (rc)
02120                 GOTO(out_destory, rc);
02121 
02122         rc = name_create(&mdtuuid, mdtname, "_UUID");
02123         if (rc)
02124                 GOTO(out_destory, rc);
02125 
02126         rc = record_start_log(env, mgs, &llh, logname);
02127         if (rc)
02128                 GOTO(out_destory, rc);
02129 
02130         rc = record_marker(env, llh, fsdb, CM_START, mti->mti_svname,
02131                            "add osp");
02132         if (rc)
02133                 GOTO(out_destory, rc);
02134 
02135         for (i = 0; i < mti->mti_nid_count; i++) {
02136                 CDEBUG(D_MGS, "add nid %s for mdt\n",
02137                         libcfs_nid2str_r(mti->mti_nids[i],
02138                                          nidstr, sizeof(nidstr)));
02139                 rc = record_add_uuid(env, llh, mti->mti_nids[i], nodeuuid);
02140                 if (rc)
02141                         GOTO(out_end, rc);
02142         }
02143 
02144         rc = record_attach(env, llh, ospname, LUSTRE_OSP_NAME, lovuuid);
02145         if (rc)
02146                 GOTO(out_end, rc);
02147 
02148         rc = record_setup(env, llh, ospname, mti->mti_uuid, nodeuuid,
02149                           NULL, NULL);
02150         if (rc)
02151                 GOTO(out_end, rc);
02152 
02153         rc = mgs_write_log_failnids(env, mti, llh, ospname);
02154         if (rc)
02155                 GOTO(out_end, rc);
02156 
02157         /* Add mdc(osp) to lod */
02158         snprintf(index_str, sizeof(index_str), "%d", mti->mti_stripe_index);
02159         rc = record_base(env, llh, lovname, 0, LCFG_ADD_MDC, mti->mti_uuid,
02160                          index_str, "1", NULL);
02161         if (rc)
02162                 GOTO(out_end, rc);
02163 
02164         rc = record_marker(env, llh, fsdb, CM_END, mti->mti_svname, "add osp");
02165         if (rc)
02166                 GOTO(out_end, rc);
02167 
02168 out_end:
02169         record_end_log(env, &llh);
02170 
02171 out_destory:
02172         name_destroy(&mdtuuid);
02173         name_destroy(&lovuuid);
02174         name_destroy(&lovname);
02175         name_destroy(&ospname);
02176         name_destroy(&svname);
02177         name_destroy(&nodeuuid);
02178         name_destroy(&mdtname);
02179         RETURN(rc);
02180 }
02181 
02182 static int mgs_write_log_mdt0(const struct lu_env *env,
02183                               struct mgs_device *mgs,
02184                               struct fs_db *fsdb,
02185                               struct mgs_target_info *mti)
02186 {
02187         char *log = mti->mti_svname;
02188         struct llog_handle *llh = NULL;
02189         char *uuid, *lovname;
02190         char mdt_index[6];
02191         char *ptr = mti->mti_params;
02192         int rc = 0, failout = 0;
02193         ENTRY;
02194 
02195         OBD_ALLOC(uuid, sizeof(struct obd_uuid));
02196         if (uuid == NULL)
02197                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
02198 
02199         if (class_find_param(ptr, PARAM_FAILMODE, &ptr) == 0)
02200                 failout = (strncmp(ptr, "failout", 7) == 0);
02201 
02202         rc = name_create(&lovname, log, "-mdtlov");
02203         if (rc)
02204                 GOTO(out_free, rc);
02205         if (mgs_log_is_empty(env, mgs, log)) {
02206                 rc = mgs_write_log_lov(env, mgs, fsdb, mti, log, lovname);
02207                 if (rc)
02208                         GOTO(out_lod, rc);
02209         }
02210 
02211         sprintf(mdt_index, "%d", mti->mti_stripe_index);
02212 
02213         rc = record_start_log(env, mgs, &llh, log);
02214         if (rc)
02215                 GOTO(out_lod, rc);
02216 
02217         /* add MDT itself */
02218 
02219         /* FIXME this whole fn should be a single journal transaction */
02220         sprintf(uuid, "%s_UUID", log);
02221         rc = record_marker(env, llh, fsdb, CM_START, log, "add mdt");
02222         if (rc)
02223                 GOTO(out_lod, rc);
02224         rc = record_attach(env, llh, log, LUSTRE_MDT_NAME, uuid);
02225         if (rc)
02226                 GOTO(out_end, rc);
02227         rc = record_mount_opt(env, llh, log, lovname, NULL);
02228         if (rc)
02229                 GOTO(out_end, rc);
02230         rc = record_setup(env, llh, log, uuid, mdt_index, lovname,
02231                         failout ? "n" : "f");
02232         if (rc)
02233                 GOTO(out_end, rc);
02234         rc = record_marker(env, llh, fsdb, CM_END, log, "add mdt");
02235         if (rc)
02236                 GOTO(out_end, rc);
02237 out_end:
02238         record_end_log(env, &llh);
02239 out_lod:
02240         name_destroy(&lovname);
02241 out_free:
02242         OBD_FREE(uuid, sizeof(struct obd_uuid));
02243         RETURN(rc);
02244 }
02245 
02246 /* envelope method for all layers log */
02247 static int mgs_write_log_mdt(const struct lu_env *env,
02248                              struct mgs_device *mgs,
02249                              struct fs_db *fsdb,
02250                              struct mgs_target_info *mti)
02251 {
02252         struct mgs_thread_info *mgi = mgs_env_info(env);
02253         struct llog_handle *llh = NULL;
02254         char *cliname;
02255         int rc, i = 0;
02256         ENTRY;
02257 
02258         CDEBUG(D_MGS, "writing new mdt %s\n", mti->mti_svname);
02259 
02260         if (mti->mti_uuid[0] == '\0') {
02261                 /* Make up our own uuid */
02262                 snprintf(mti->mti_uuid, sizeof(mti->mti_uuid),
02263                          "%s_UUID", mti->mti_svname);
02264         }
02265 
02266         /* add mdt */
02267         rc = mgs_write_log_mdt0(env, mgs, fsdb, mti);
02268         if (rc)
02269                 RETURN(rc);
02270         /* Append the mdt info to the client log */
02271         rc = name_create(&cliname, mti->mti_fsname, "-client");
02272         if (rc)
02273                 RETURN(rc);
02274 
02275         if (mgs_log_is_empty(env, mgs, cliname)) {
02276                 /* Start client log */
02277                 rc = mgs_write_log_lov(env, mgs, fsdb, mti, cliname,
02278                                        fsdb->fsdb_clilov);
02279                 if (rc)
02280                         GOTO(out_free, rc);
02281                 rc = mgs_write_log_lmv(env, mgs, fsdb, mti, cliname,
02282                                        fsdb->fsdb_clilmv);
02283                 if (rc)
02284                         GOTO(out_free, rc);
02285         }
02286 
02287         /*
02288         #09 L add_uuid nid=uml1@tcp(0x20000c0a80201) 0:  1:uml1_UUID
02289         #10 L attach   0:MDC_uml1_mdsA_MNT_client  1:mdc  2:1d834_MNT_client_03f
02290         #11 L setup    0:MDC_uml1_mdsA_MNT_client  1:mdsA_UUID  2:uml1_UUID
02291         #12 L add_uuid nid=uml2@tcp(0x20000c0a80202) 0:  1:uml2_UUID
02292         #13 L add_conn 0:MDC_uml1_mdsA_MNT_client  1:uml2_UUID
02293         #14 L mount_option 0:  1:client  2:lov1  3:MDC_uml1_mdsA_MNT_client
02294         */
02295 
02296                 /* copy client info about lov/lmv */
02297                 mgi->mgi_comp.comp_mti = mti;
02298                 mgi->mgi_comp.comp_fsdb = fsdb;
02299 
02300                 rc = mgs_steal_llog_for_mdt_from_client(env, mgs, cliname,
02301                                                         &mgi->mgi_comp);
02302                 if (rc)
02303                         GOTO(out_free, rc);
02304                 rc = mgs_write_log_mdc_to_lmv(env, mgs, fsdb, mti, cliname,
02305                                               fsdb->fsdb_clilmv);
02306                 if (rc)
02307                         GOTO(out_free, rc);
02308 
02309                 /* add mountopts */
02310                 rc = record_start_log(env, mgs, &llh, cliname);
02311                 if (rc)
02312                         GOTO(out_free, rc);
02313 
02314                 rc = record_marker(env, llh, fsdb, CM_START, cliname,
02315                                    "mount opts");
02316                 if (rc)
02317                         GOTO(out_end, rc);
02318                 rc = record_mount_opt(env, llh, cliname, fsdb->fsdb_clilov,
02319                                       fsdb->fsdb_clilmv);
02320                 if (rc)
02321                         GOTO(out_end, rc);
02322                 rc = record_marker(env, llh, fsdb, CM_END, cliname,
02323                                    "mount opts");
02324 
02325         if (rc)
02326                 GOTO(out_end, rc);
02327 
02328         /* for_all_existing_mdt except current one */
02329         for (i = 0; i < INDEX_MAP_SIZE * 8; i++) {
02330                 if (i !=  mti->mti_stripe_index &&
02331                     test_bit(i, fsdb->fsdb_mdt_index_map)) {
02332                         char *logname;
02333 
02334                         rc = name_create_mdt(&logname, fsdb->fsdb_name, i);
02335                         if (rc)
02336                                 GOTO(out_end, rc);
02337 
02338                         rc = mgs_write_log_osp_to_mdt(env, mgs, fsdb, mti,
02339                                                       i, logname);
02340                         name_destroy(&logname);
02341                         if (rc)
02342                                 GOTO(out_end, rc);
02343                 }
02344         }
02345 out_end:
02346         record_end_log(env, &llh);
02347 out_free:
02348         name_destroy(&cliname);
02349         RETURN(rc);
02350 }
02351 
02352 /* Add the ost info to the client/mdt lov */
02353 static int mgs_write_log_osc_to_lov(const struct lu_env *env,
02354                                     struct mgs_device *mgs, struct fs_db *fsdb,
02355                                     struct mgs_target_info *mti,
02356                                     char *logname, char *suffix, char *lovname,
02357                                     enum lustre_sec_part sec_part, int flags)
02358 {
02359         struct llog_handle *llh = NULL;
02360         char *nodeuuid = NULL;
02361         char *oscname = NULL;
02362         char *oscuuid = NULL;
02363         char *lovuuid = NULL;
02364         char *svname = NULL;
02365         char index[6];
02366         char nidstr[LNET_NIDSTR_SIZE];
02367         int i, rc;
02368         ENTRY;
02369 
02370         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "adding osc for %s to log %s\n",
02371                 mti->mti_svname, logname);
02372 
02373         if (mgs_log_is_empty(env, mgs, logname)) {
02374                 CERROR("log is empty! Logical error\n");
02375                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
02376         }
02377 
02378         libcfs_nid2str_r(mti->mti_nids[0], nidstr, sizeof(nidstr));
02379         rc = name_create(&nodeuuid, nidstr, "");
02380         if (rc)
02381                 RETURN(rc);
02382         rc = name_create(&svname, mti->mti_svname, "-osc");
02383         if (rc)
02384                 GOTO(out_free, rc);
02385 
02386         /* for the system upgraded from old 1.8, keep using the old osc naming
02387          * style for mdt, see name_create_mdt_osc(). LU-1257 */
02388         if (test_bit(FSDB_OSCNAME18, &fsdb->fsdb_flags))
02389                 rc = name_create(&oscname, svname, "");
02390         else
02391                 rc = name_create(&oscname, svname, suffix);
02392         if (rc)
02393                 GOTO(out_free, rc);
02394 
02395         rc = name_create(&oscuuid, oscname, "_UUID");
02396         if (rc)
02397                 GOTO(out_free, rc);
02398         rc = name_create(&lovuuid, lovname, "_UUID");
02399         if (rc)
02400                 GOTO(out_free, rc);
02401 
02402 
02403         /*
02404         #03 L add_uuid nid=uml1@tcp(0x20000c0a80201) 0:  1:uml1_UUID
02405         multihomed (#4)
02406         #04 L add_uuid  nid=1@elan(0x1000000000001)  nal=90 0:  1:uml1_UUID
02407         #04 L attach   0:OSC_uml1_ost1_MNT_client  1:osc  2:89070_lov1_a41dff51a
02408         #05 L setup    0:OSC_uml1_ost1_MNT_client  1:ost1_UUID  2:uml1_UUID
02409         failover (#6,7)
02410         #06 L add_uuid nid=uml2@tcp(0x20000c0a80202) 0:  1:uml2_UUID
02411         #07 L add_conn 0:OSC_uml1_ost1_MNT_client  1:uml2_UUID
02412         #08 L lov_modify_tgts add 0:lov1  1:ost1_UUID  2(index):0  3(gen):1
02413         */
02414 
02415         rc = record_start_log(env, mgs, &llh, logname);
02416         if (rc)
02417                 GOTO(out_free, rc);
02418 
02419         /* FIXME these should be a single journal transaction */
02420         rc = record_marker(env, llh, fsdb, CM_START | flags, mti->mti_svname,
02421                            "add osc");
02422         if (rc)
02423                 GOTO(out_end, rc);
02424 
02425         /* NB: don't change record order, because upon MDT steal OSC config
02426          * from client, it treats all nids before LCFG_SETUP as target nids
02427          * (multiple interfaces), while nids after as failover node nids.
02428          * See mgs_steal_client_llog_handler() LCFG_ADD_UUID.
02429          */
02430         for (i = 0; i < mti->mti_nid_count; i++) {
02431                 CDEBUG(D_MGS, "add nid %s\n",
02432                         libcfs_nid2str_r(mti->mti_nids[i],
02433                                          nidstr, sizeof(nidstr)));
02434                 rc = record_add_uuid(env, llh, mti->mti_nids[i], nodeuuid);
02435                 if (rc)
02436                         GOTO(out_end, rc);
02437         }
02438         rc = record_attach(env, llh, oscname, LUSTRE_OSC_NAME, lovuuid);
02439         if (rc)
02440                 GOTO(out_end, rc);
02441         rc = record_setup(env, llh, oscname, mti->mti_uuid, nodeuuid,
02442                           NULL, NULL);
02443         if (rc)
02444                 GOTO(out_end, rc);
02445         rc = mgs_write_log_failnids(env, mti, llh, oscname);
02446         if (rc)
02447                 GOTO(out_end, rc);
02448 
02449         snprintf(index, sizeof(index), "%d", mti->mti_stripe_index);
02450 
02451         rc = record_lov_add(env, llh, lovname, mti->mti_uuid, index, "1");
02452         if (rc)
02453                 GOTO(out_end, rc);
02454         rc = record_marker(env, llh, fsdb, CM_END | flags, mti->mti_svname,
02455                            "add osc");
02456         if (rc)
02457                 GOTO(out_end, rc);
02458 out_end:
02459         record_end_log(env, &llh);
02460 out_free:
02461         name_destroy(&lovuuid);
02462         name_destroy(&oscuuid);
02463         name_destroy(&oscname);
02464         name_destroy(&svname);
02465         name_destroy(&nodeuuid);
02466         RETURN(rc);
02467 }
02468 
02469 static int mgs_write_log_ost(const struct lu_env *env,
02470                              struct mgs_device *mgs, struct fs_db *fsdb,
02471                              struct mgs_target_info *mti)
02472 {
02473         struct llog_handle *llh = NULL;
02474         char *logname, *lovname;
02475         char *ptr = mti->mti_params;
02476         int rc, flags = 0, failout = 0, i;
02477         ENTRY;
02478 
02479         CDEBUG(D_MGS, "writing new ost %s\n", mti->mti_svname);
02480 
02481         /* The ost startup log */
02482 
02483         /* If the ost log already exists, that means that someone reformatted
02484            the ost and it called target_add again. */
02485         if (!mgs_log_is_empty(env, mgs, mti->mti_svname)) {
02486                 LCONSOLE_ERROR_MSG(0x141, "The config log for %s already "
02487                                    "exists, yet the server claims it never "
02488                                    "registered. It may have been reformatted, "
02489                                    "or the index changed. writeconf the MDT to "
02490                                    "regenerate all logs.\n", mti->mti_svname);
02491                 RETURN(-EALREADY);
02492         }
02493 
02494         /*
02495         attach obdfilter ost1 ost1_UUID
02496         setup /dev/loop2 ldiskfs f|n errors=remount-ro,user_xattr
02497         */
02498         if (class_find_param(ptr, PARAM_FAILMODE, &ptr) == 0)
02499                 failout = (strncmp(ptr, "failout", 7) == 0);
02500         rc = record_start_log(env, mgs, &llh, mti->mti_svname);
02501         if (rc)
02502                 RETURN(rc);
02503         /* FIXME these should be a single journal transaction */
02504         rc = record_marker(env, llh, fsdb, CM_START, mti->mti_svname,"add ost");
02505         if (rc)
02506                 GOTO(out_end, rc);
02507         if (*mti->mti_uuid == '\0')
02508                 snprintf(mti->mti_uuid, sizeof(mti->mti_uuid),
02509                          "%s_UUID", mti->mti_svname);
02510         rc = record_attach(env, llh, mti->mti_svname,
02511                            "obdfilter"/*LUSTRE_OST_NAME*/, mti->mti_uuid);
02512         if (rc)
02513                 GOTO(out_end, rc);
02514         rc = record_setup(env, llh, mti->mti_svname,
02515                           "dev"/*ignored*/, "type"/*ignored*/,
02516                           failout ? "n" : "f", NULL/*options*/);
02517         if (rc)
02518                 GOTO(out_end, rc);
02519         rc = record_marker(env, llh, fsdb, CM_END, mti->mti_svname, "add ost");
02520         if (rc)
02521                 GOTO(out_end, rc);
02522 out_end:
02523         record_end_log(env, &llh);
02524         if (rc)
02525                 RETURN(rc);
02526         /* We also have to update the other logs where this osc is part of
02527            the lov */
02528 
02529         if (test_bit(FSDB_OLDLOG14, &fsdb->fsdb_flags)) {
02530                 /* If we're upgrading, the old mdt log already has our
02531                    entry. Let's do a fake one for fun. */
02532                 /* Note that we can't add any new failnids, since we don't
02533                    know the old osc names. */
02534                 flags = CM_SKIP | CM_UPGRADE146;
02535 
02536         } else if ((mti->mti_flags & LDD_F_UPDATE) != LDD_F_UPDATE) {
02537                 /* If the update flag isn't set, don't update client/mdt
02538                    logs. */
02539                 flags |= CM_SKIP;
02540                 LCONSOLE_WARN("Client log for %s was not updated; writeconf "
02541                               "the MDT first to regenerate it.\n",
02542                               mti->mti_svname);
02543         }
02544 
02545         /* Add ost to all MDT lov defs */
02546         for (i = 0; i < INDEX_MAP_SIZE * 8; i++){
02547                 if (test_bit(i, fsdb->fsdb_mdt_index_map)) {
02548                         char mdt_index[9];
02549 
02550                         rc = name_create_mdt_and_lov(&logname, &lovname, fsdb,
02551                                                      i);
02552                         if (rc)
02553                                 RETURN(rc);
02554                         sprintf(mdt_index, "-MDT%04x", i);
02555                         rc = mgs_write_log_osc_to_lov(env, mgs, fsdb, mti,
02556                                                       logname, mdt_index,
02557                                                       lovname, LUSTRE_SP_MDT,
02558                                                       flags);
02559                         name_destroy(&logname);
02560                         name_destroy(&lovname);
02561                         if (rc)
02562                                 RETURN(rc);
02563                 }
02564         }
02565 
02566         /* Append ost info to the client log */
02567         rc = name_create(&logname, mti->mti_fsname, "-client");
02568         if (rc)
02569                 RETURN(rc);
02570         if (mgs_log_is_empty(env, mgs, logname)) {
02571                 /* Start client log */
02572                 rc = mgs_write_log_lov(env, mgs, fsdb, mti, logname,
02573                                        fsdb->fsdb_clilov);
02574                 if (rc)
02575                         GOTO(out_free, rc);
02576                 rc = mgs_write_log_lmv(env, mgs, fsdb, mti, logname,
02577                                        fsdb->fsdb_clilmv);
02578                 if (rc)
02579                         GOTO(out_free, rc);
02580         }
02581         rc = mgs_write_log_osc_to_lov(env, mgs, fsdb, mti, logname, "",
02582                                       fsdb->fsdb_clilov, LUSTRE_SP_CLI, flags);
02583 out_free:
02584         name_destroy(&logname);
02585         RETURN(rc);
02586 }
02587 
02588 static __inline__ int mgs_param_empty(char *ptr)
02589 {
02590         char *tmp;
02591 
02592         if ((tmp = strchr(ptr, '=')) && (*(++tmp) == '\0'))
02593                 return 1;
02594         return 0;
02595 }
02596 
02597 static int mgs_write_log_failnid_internal(const struct lu_env *env,
02598                                           struct mgs_device *mgs,
02599                                           struct fs_db *fsdb,
02600                                           struct mgs_target_info *mti,
02601                                           char *logname, char *cliname)
02602 {
02603         int rc;
02604         struct llog_handle *llh = NULL;
02605 
02606         if (mgs_param_empty(mti->mti_params)) {
02607                 /* Remove _all_ failnids */
02608                 rc = mgs_modify(env, mgs, fsdb, mti, logname,
02609                                 mti->mti_svname, "add failnid", CM_SKIP);
02610                 return rc < 0 ? rc : 0;
02611         }
02612 
02613         /* Otherwise failover nids are additive */
02614         rc = record_start_log(env, mgs, &llh, logname);
02615         if (rc)
02616                 return rc;
02617                 /* FIXME this should be a single journal transaction */
02618         rc = record_marker(env, llh, fsdb, CM_START, mti->mti_svname,
02619                            "add failnid");
02620         if (rc)
02621                 goto out_end;
02622         rc = mgs_write_log_failnids(env, mti, llh, cliname);
02623         if (rc)
02624                 goto out_end;
02625         rc = record_marker(env, llh, fsdb, CM_END,
02626                            mti->mti_svname, "add failnid");
02627 out_end:
02628         record_end_log(env, &llh);
02629         return rc;
02630 }
02631 
02632 
02633 /* Add additional failnids to an existing log.
02634    The mdc/osc must have been added to logs first */
02635 /* tcp nids must be in dotted-quad ascii -
02636    we can't resolve hostnames from the kernel. */
02637 static int mgs_write_log_add_failnid(const struct lu_env *env,
02638                                      struct mgs_device *mgs,
02639                                      struct fs_db *fsdb,
02640                                      struct mgs_target_info *mti)
02641 {
02642         char *logname, *cliname;
02643         int rc;
02644         ENTRY;
02645 
02646         /* FIXME we currently can't erase the failnids
02647          * given when a target first registers, since they aren't part of
02648          * an "add uuid" stanza */
02649 
02650         /* Verify that we know about this target */
02651         if (mgs_log_is_empty(env, mgs, mti->mti_svname)) {
02652                 LCONSOLE_ERROR_MSG(0x142, "The target %s has not registered "
02653                                    "yet. It must be started before failnids "
02654                                    "can be added.\n", mti->mti_svname);
02655                 RETURN(-ENOENT);
02656         }
02657 
02658         /* Create mdc/osc client name (e.g. lustre-OST0001-osc) */
02659         if (mti->mti_flags & LDD_F_SV_TYPE_MDT) {
02660                 rc = name_create(&cliname, mti->mti_svname, "-mdc");
02661         } else if (mti->mti_flags & LDD_F_SV_TYPE_OST) {
02662                 rc = name_create(&cliname, mti->mti_svname, "-osc");
02663         } else {
02664                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
02665         }
02666         if (rc)
02667                 RETURN(rc);
02668         /* Add failover nids to the client log */
02669         rc = name_create(&logname, mti->mti_fsname, "-client");
02670         if (rc) {
02671                 name_destroy(&cliname);
02672                 RETURN(rc);
02673         }
02674         rc = mgs_write_log_failnid_internal(env, mgs, fsdb,mti,logname,cliname);
02675         name_destroy(&logname);
02676         name_destroy(&cliname);
02677         if (rc)
02678                 RETURN(rc);
02679 
02680         if (mti->mti_flags & LDD_F_SV_TYPE_OST) {
02681                 /* Add OST failover nids to the MDT logs as well */
02682                 int i;
02683 
02684                 for (i = 0; i < INDEX_MAP_SIZE * 8; i++) {
02685                         if (!test_bit(i, fsdb->fsdb_mdt_index_map))
02686                                 continue;
02687                         rc = name_create_mdt(&logname, mti->mti_fsname, i);
02688                         if (rc)
02689                                 RETURN(rc);
02690                         rc = name_create_mdt_osc(&cliname, mti->mti_svname,
02691                                                  fsdb, i);
02692                         if (rc) {
02693                                 name_destroy(&logname);
02694                                 RETURN(rc);
02695                         }
02696                         rc = mgs_write_log_failnid_internal(env, mgs, fsdb,
02697                                                             mti, logname,
02698                                                             cliname);
02699                         name_destroy(&cliname);
02700                         name_destroy(&logname);
02701                         if (rc)
02702                                 RETURN(rc);
02703                 }
02704         }
02705 
02706         RETURN(rc);
02707 }
02708 
02709 static int mgs_wlp_lcfg(const struct lu_env *env,
02710                         struct mgs_device *mgs, struct fs_db *fsdb,
02711                         struct mgs_target_info *mti,
02712                         char *logname, struct lustre_cfg_bufs *bufs,
02713                         char *tgtname, char *ptr)
02714 {
02715         char comment[MTI_NAME_MAXLEN];
02716         char *tmp;
02717         struct llog_cfg_rec *lcr;
02718         int rc, del;
02719 
02720         /* Erase any old settings of this same parameter */
02721         memcpy(comment, ptr, MTI_NAME_MAXLEN);
02722         comment[MTI_NAME_MAXLEN - 1] = 0;
02723         /* But don't try to match the value. */
02724         tmp = strchr(comment, '=');
02725         if (tmp != NULL)
02726                 *tmp = 0;
02727         /* FIXME we should skip settings that are the same as old values */
02728         rc = mgs_modify(env, mgs, fsdb, mti, logname, tgtname, comment,CM_SKIP);
02729         if (rc < 0)
02730                 return rc;
02731         del = mgs_param_empty(ptr);
02732 
02733         LCONSOLE_INFO("%s parameter %s.%s in log %s\n", del ? "Disabling" : rc ?
02734                       "Setting" : "Modifying", tgtname, comment, logname);
02735         if (del) {
02736                 /* mgs_modify() will return 1 if nothing had to be done */
02737                 if (rc == 1)
02738                         rc = 0;
02739                 return rc;
02740         }
02741 
02742         lustre_cfg_bufs_reset(bufs, tgtname);
02743         lustre_cfg_bufs_set_string(bufs, 1, ptr);
02744         if (mti->mti_flags & LDD_F_PARAM2)
02745                 lustre_cfg_bufs_set_string(bufs, 2, LCTL_UPCALL);
02746 
02747         lcr = lustre_cfg_rec_new((mti->mti_flags & LDD_F_PARAM2) ?
02748                                  LCFG_SET_PARAM : LCFG_PARAM, bufs);
02749         if (lcr == NULL)
02750                 return -ENOMEM;
02751 
02752         rc = mgs_write_log_direct(env, mgs, fsdb, logname, lcr, tgtname,
02753                                   comment);
02754         lustre_cfg_rec_free(lcr);
02755         return rc;
02756 }
02757 
02758 static int mgs_write_log_param2(const struct lu_env *env,
02759                                 struct mgs_device *mgs,
02760                                 struct fs_db *fsdb,
02761                                 struct mgs_target_info *mti, char *ptr)
02762 {
02763         struct lustre_cfg_bufs  bufs;
02764         int                     rc = 0;
02765         ENTRY;
02766 
02767         CDEBUG(D_MGS, "next param '%s'\n", ptr);
02768         rc = mgs_wlp_lcfg(env, mgs, fsdb, mti, PARAMS_FILENAME, &bufs,
02769                           mti->mti_svname, ptr);
02770 
02771         RETURN(rc);
02772 }
02773 
02774 /* write global variable settings into log */
02775 static int mgs_write_log_sys(const struct lu_env *env,
02776                              struct mgs_device *mgs, struct fs_db *fsdb,
02777                              struct mgs_target_info *mti, char *sys, char *ptr)
02778 {
02779         struct mgs_thread_info  *mgi = mgs_env_info(env);
02780         struct lustre_cfg       *lcfg;
02781         struct llog_cfg_rec     *lcr;
02782         char *tmp, sep;
02783         int rc, cmd, convert = 1;
02784 
02785         if (class_match_param(ptr, PARAM_TIMEOUT, &tmp) == 0) {
02786                 cmd = LCFG_SET_TIMEOUT;
02787         } else if (class_match_param(ptr, PARAM_LDLM_TIMEOUT, &tmp) == 0) {
02788                 cmd = LCFG_SET_LDLM_TIMEOUT;
02789         /* Check for known params here so we can return error to lctl */
02790         } else if ((class_match_param(ptr, PARAM_AT_MIN, &tmp) == 0) ||
02791                 (class_match_param(ptr, PARAM_AT_MAX, &tmp) == 0) ||
02792                 (class_match_param(ptr, PARAM_AT_EXTRA, &tmp) == 0) ||
02793                 (class_match_param(ptr, PARAM_AT_EARLY_MARGIN, &tmp) == 0) ||
02794                 (class_match_param(ptr, PARAM_AT_HISTORY, &tmp) == 0)) {
02795                 cmd = LCFG_PARAM;
02796         } else if (class_match_param(ptr, PARAM_JOBID_VAR, &tmp) == 0) {
02797                 convert = 0; /* Don't convert string value to integer */
02798                 cmd = LCFG_PARAM;
02799         } else {
02800                 return -EINVAL;
02801         }
02802 
02803         if (mgs_param_empty(ptr))
02804                 CDEBUG(D_MGS, "global '%s' removed\n", sys);
02805         else
02806                 CDEBUG(D_MGS, "global '%s' val=%s\n", sys, tmp);
02807 
02808         lustre_cfg_bufs_reset(&mgi->mgi_bufs, NULL);
02809         lustre_cfg_bufs_set_string(&mgi->mgi_bufs, 1, sys);
02810         if (!convert && *tmp != '\0')
02811                 lustre_cfg_bufs_set_string(&mgi->mgi_bufs, 2, tmp);
02812         lcr = lustre_cfg_rec_new(cmd, &mgi->mgi_bufs);
02813         if (lcr == NULL)
02814                 return -ENOMEM;
02815 
02816         lcfg = &lcr->lcr_cfg;
02817         lcfg->lcfg_num = convert ? simple_strtoul(tmp, NULL, 0) : 0;
02818         /* truncate the comment to the parameter name */
02819         ptr = tmp - 1;
02820         sep = *ptr;
02821         *ptr = '\0';
02822         /* modify all servers and clients */
02823         rc = mgs_write_log_direct_all(env, mgs, fsdb, mti,
02824                                       *tmp == '\0' ? NULL : lcr,
02825                                       mti->mti_fsname, sys, 0);
02826         if (rc == 0 && *tmp != '\0') {
02827                 switch (cmd) {
02828                 case LCFG_SET_TIMEOUT:
02829                         if (!obd_timeout_set || lcfg->lcfg_num > obd_timeout)
02830                                 class_process_config(lcfg);
02831                         break;
02832                 case LCFG_SET_LDLM_TIMEOUT:
02833                         if (!ldlm_timeout_set || lcfg->lcfg_num > ldlm_timeout)
02834                                 class_process_config(lcfg);
02835                         break;
02836                 default:
02837                         break;
02838                 }
02839         }
02840         *ptr = sep;
02841         lustre_cfg_rec_free(lcr);
02842         return rc;
02843 }
02844 
02845 /* write quota settings into log */
02846 static int mgs_write_log_quota(const struct lu_env *env, struct mgs_device *mgs,
02847                                struct fs_db *fsdb, struct mgs_target_info *mti,
02848                                char *quota, char *ptr)
02849 {
02850         struct mgs_thread_info  *mgi = mgs_env_info(env);
02851         struct llog_cfg_rec     *lcr;
02852         char                    *tmp;
02853         char                     sep;
02854         int                      rc, cmd = LCFG_PARAM;
02855 
02856         /* support only 'meta' and 'data' pools so far */
02857         if (class_match_param(ptr, QUOTA_METAPOOL_NAME, &tmp) != 0 &&
02858             class_match_param(ptr, QUOTA_DATAPOOL_NAME, &tmp) != 0) {
02859                 CERROR("parameter quota.%s isn't supported (only quota.mdt "
02860                        "& quota.ost are)\n", ptr);
02861                 return -EINVAL;
02862         }
02863 
02864         if (*tmp == '\0') {
02865                 CDEBUG(D_MGS, "global '%s' removed\n", quota);
02866         } else {
02867                 CDEBUG(D_MGS, "global '%s'\n", quota);
02868 
02869                 if (strchr(tmp, 'u') == NULL && strchr(tmp, 'g') == NULL &&
02870                     strcmp(tmp, "none") != 0) {
02871                         CERROR("enable option(%s) isn't supported\n", tmp);
02872                         return -EINVAL;
02873                 }
02874         }
02875 
02876         lustre_cfg_bufs_reset(&mgi->mgi_bufs, mti->mti_fsname);
02877         lustre_cfg_bufs_set_string(&mgi->mgi_bufs, 1, quota);
02878         lcr = lustre_cfg_rec_new(cmd, &mgi->mgi_bufs);
02879         if (lcr == NULL)
02880                 return -ENOMEM;
02881 
02882         /* truncate the comment to the parameter name */
02883         ptr = tmp - 1;
02884         sep = *ptr;
02885         *ptr = '\0';
02886 
02887         /* XXX we duplicated quota enable information in all server
02888          *     config logs, it should be moved to a separate config
02889          *     log once we cleanup the config log for global param. */
02890         /* modify all servers */
02891         rc = mgs_write_log_direct_all(env, mgs, fsdb, mti,
02892                                       *tmp == '\0' ? NULL : lcr,
02893                                       mti->mti_fsname, quota, 1);
02894         *ptr = sep;
02895         lustre_cfg_rec_free(lcr);
02896         return rc < 0 ? rc : 0;
02897 }
02898 
02899 static int mgs_srpc_set_param_disk(const struct lu_env *env,
02900                                    struct mgs_device *mgs,
02901                                    struct fs_db *fsdb,
02902                                    struct mgs_target_info *mti,
02903                                    char *param)
02904 {
02905         struct mgs_thread_info  *mgi = mgs_env_info(env);
02906         struct llog_cfg_rec     *lcr;
02907         struct llog_handle      *llh = NULL;
02908         char                    *logname;
02909         char                    *comment, *ptr;
02910         int                      rc, len;
02911 
02912         ENTRY;
02913 
02914         /* get comment */
02915         ptr = strchr(param, '=');
02916         LASSERT(ptr != NULL);
02917         len = ptr - param;
02918 
02919         OBD_ALLOC(comment, len + 1);
02920         if (comment == NULL)
02921                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
02922         strncpy(comment, param, len);
02923         comment[len] = '\0';
02924 
02925         /* prepare lcfg */
02926         lustre_cfg_bufs_reset(&mgi->mgi_bufs, mti->mti_svname);
02927         lustre_cfg_bufs_set_string(&mgi->mgi_bufs, 1, param);
02928         lcr = lustre_cfg_rec_new(LCFG_SPTLRPC_CONF, &mgi->mgi_bufs);
02929         if (lcr == NULL)
02930                 GOTO(out_comment, rc = -ENOMEM);
02931 
02932         /* construct log name */
02933         rc = name_create(&logname, mti->mti_fsname, "-sptlrpc");
02934         if (rc < 0)
02935                 GOTO(out_lcfg, rc);
02936 
02937         if (mgs_log_is_empty(env, mgs, logname)) {
02938                 rc = record_start_log(env, mgs, &llh, logname);
02939                 if (rc < 0)
02940                         GOTO(out, rc);
02941                 record_end_log(env, &llh);
02942         }
02943 
02944         /* obsolete old one */
02945         rc = mgs_modify(env, mgs, fsdb, mti, logname, mti->mti_svname,
02946                         comment, CM_SKIP);
02947         if (rc < 0)
02948                 GOTO(out, rc);
02949         /* write the new one */
02950         rc = mgs_write_log_direct(env, mgs, fsdb, logname, lcr,
02951                                   mti->mti_svname, comment);
02952         if (rc)
02953                 CERROR("%s: error writing log %s: rc = %d\n",
02954                        mgs->mgs_obd->obd_name, logname, rc);
02955 out:
02956         name_destroy(&logname);
02957 out_lcfg:
02958         lustre_cfg_rec_free(lcr);
02959 out_comment:
02960         OBD_FREE(comment, len + 1);
02961         RETURN(rc);
02962 }
02963 
02964 static int mgs_srpc_set_param_udesc_mem(struct fs_db *fsdb,
02965                                         char *param)
02966 {
02967         char    *ptr;
02968 
02969         /* disable the adjustable udesc parameter for now, i.e. use default
02970          * setting that client always ship udesc to MDT if possible. to enable
02971          * it simply remove the following line */
02972         goto error_out;
02973 
02974         ptr = strchr(param, '=');
02975         if (ptr == NULL)
02976                 goto error_out;
02977         *ptr++ = '\0';
02978 
02979         if (strcmp(param, PARAM_SRPC_UDESC))
02980                 goto error_out;
02981 
02982         if (strcmp(ptr, "yes") == 0) {
02983                 set_bit(FSDB_UDESC, &fsdb->fsdb_flags);
02984                 CWARN("Enable user descriptor shipping from client to MDT\n");
02985         } else if (strcmp(ptr, "no") == 0) {
02986                 clear_bit(FSDB_UDESC, &fsdb->fsdb_flags);
02987                 CWARN("Disable user descriptor shipping from client to MDT\n");
02988         } else {
02989                 *(ptr - 1) = '=';
02990                 goto error_out;
02991         }
02992         return 0;
02993 
02994 error_out:
02995         CERROR("Invalid param: %s\n", param);
02996         return -EINVAL;
02997 }
02998 
02999 static int mgs_srpc_set_param_mem(struct fs_db *fsdb,
03000                                   const char *svname,
03001                                   char *param)
03002 {
03003         struct sptlrpc_rule      rule;
03004         struct sptlrpc_rule_set *rset;
03005         int                      rc;
03006         ENTRY;
03007 
03008         if (strncmp(param, PARAM_SRPC, sizeof(PARAM_SRPC) - 1) != 0) {
03009                 CERROR("Invalid sptlrpc parameter: %s\n", param);
03010                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
03011         }
03012 
03013         if (strncmp(param, PARAM_SRPC_UDESC,
03014                     sizeof(PARAM_SRPC_UDESC) - 1) == 0) {
03015                 RETURN(mgs_srpc_set_param_udesc_mem(fsdb, param));
03016         }
03017 
03018         if (strncmp(param, PARAM_SRPC_FLVR, sizeof(PARAM_SRPC_FLVR) - 1) != 0) {
03019                 CERROR("Invalid sptlrpc flavor parameter: %s\n", param);
03020                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
03021         }
03022 
03023         param += sizeof(PARAM_SRPC_FLVR) - 1;
03024 
03025         rc = sptlrpc_parse_rule(param, &rule);
03026         if (rc)
03027                 RETURN(rc);
03028 
03029         /* mgs rules implies must be mgc->mgs */
03030         if (test_bit(FSDB_MGS_SELF, &fsdb->fsdb_flags)) {
03031                 if ((rule.sr_from != LUSTRE_SP_MGC &&
03032                      rule.sr_from != LUSTRE_SP_ANY) ||
03033                     (rule.sr_to != LUSTRE_SP_MGS &&
03034                      rule.sr_to != LUSTRE_SP_ANY))
03035                         RETURN(-EINVAL);
03036         }
03037 
03038         /* preapre room for this coming rule. svcname format should be:
03039          * - fsname: general rule
03040          * - fsname-tgtname: target-specific rule
03041          */
03042         if (strchr(svname, '-')) {
03043                 struct mgs_tgt_srpc_conf *tgtconf;
03044                 int                       found = 0;
03045 
03046                 for (tgtconf = fsdb->fsdb_srpc_tgt; tgtconf != NULL;
03047                      tgtconf = tgtconf->mtsc_next) {
03048                         if (!strcmp(tgtconf->mtsc_tgt, svname)) {
03049                                 found = 1;
03050                                 break;
03051                         }
03052                 }
03053 
03054                 if (!found) {
03055                         int name_len;
03056 
03057                         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(tgtconf);
03058                         if (tgtconf == NULL)
03059                                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
03060 
03061                         name_len = strlen(svname);
03062 
03063                         OBD_ALLOC(tgtconf->mtsc_tgt, name_len + 1);
03064                         if (tgtconf->mtsc_tgt == NULL) {
03065                                 OBD_FREE_PTR(tgtconf);
03066                                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
03067                         }
03068                         memcpy(tgtconf->mtsc_tgt, svname, name_len);
03069 
03070                         tgtconf->mtsc_next = fsdb->fsdb_srpc_tgt;
03071                         fsdb->fsdb_srpc_tgt = tgtconf;
03072                 }
03073 
03074                 rset = &tgtconf->mtsc_rset;
03075         } else if (strcmp(svname, MGSSELF_NAME) == 0) {
03076                 /* put _mgs related srpc rule directly in mgs ruleset */
03077                 rset = &fsdb->fsdb_mgs->mgs_lut.lut_sptlrpc_rset;
03078         } else {
03079                 rset = &fsdb->fsdb_srpc_gen;
03080         }
03081 
03082         rc = sptlrpc_rule_set_merge(rset, &rule);
03083 
03084         RETURN(rc);
03085 }
03086 
03087 static int mgs_srpc_set_param(const struct lu_env *env,
03088                               struct mgs_device *mgs,
03089                               struct fs_db *fsdb,
03090                               struct mgs_target_info *mti,
03091                               char *param)
03092 {
03093         char                   *copy;
03094         int                     rc, copy_size;
03095         ENTRY;
03096 
03097 #ifndef HAVE_GSS
03098         RETURN(-EINVAL);
03099 #endif
03100         /* keep a copy of original param, which could be destroied
03101          * during parsing */
03102         copy_size = strlen(param) + 1;
03103         OBD_ALLOC(copy, copy_size);
03104         if (copy == NULL)
03105                 return -ENOMEM;
03106         memcpy(copy, param, copy_size);
03107 
03108         rc = mgs_srpc_set_param_mem(fsdb, mti->mti_svname, param);
03109         if (rc)
03110                 goto out_free;
03111 
03112         /* previous steps guaranteed the syntax is correct */
03113         rc = mgs_srpc_set_param_disk(env, mgs, fsdb, mti, copy);
03114         if (rc)
03115                 goto out_free;
03116 
03117         if (test_bit(FSDB_MGS_SELF, &fsdb->fsdb_flags)) {
03118                 /*
03119                  * for mgs rules, make them effective immediately.
03120                  */
03121                 LASSERT(fsdb->fsdb_srpc_tgt == NULL);
03122                 sptlrpc_target_update_exp_flavor(mgs->mgs_obd,
03123                                                  &fsdb->fsdb_srpc_gen);
03124         }
03125 
03126 out_free:
03127         OBD_FREE(copy, copy_size);
03128         RETURN(rc);
03129 }
03130 
03131 struct mgs_srpc_read_data {
03132         struct fs_db   *msrd_fsdb;
03133         int             msrd_skip;
03134 };
03135 
03136 static int mgs_srpc_read_handler(const struct lu_env *env,
03137                                  struct llog_handle *llh,
03138                                  struct llog_rec_hdr *rec, void *data)
03139 {
03140         struct mgs_srpc_read_data *msrd = data;
03141         struct cfg_marker         *marker;
03142         struct lustre_cfg         *lcfg = REC_DATA(rec);
03143         char                      *svname, *param;
03144         int                        cfg_len, rc;
03145         ENTRY;
03146 
03147         if (rec->lrh_type != OBD_CFG_REC) {
03148                 CERROR("unhandled lrh_type: %#x\n", rec->lrh_type);
03149                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
03150         }
03151 
03152         cfg_len = REC_DATA_LEN(rec);
03153 
03154         rc = lustre_cfg_sanity_check(lcfg, cfg_len);
03155         if (rc) {
03156                 CERROR("Insane cfg\n");
03157                 RETURN(rc);
03158         }
03159 
03160         if (lcfg->lcfg_command == LCFG_MARKER) {
03161                 marker = lustre_cfg_buf(lcfg, 1);
03162 
03163                 if (marker->cm_flags & CM_START &&
03164                     marker->cm_flags & CM_SKIP)
03165                         msrd->msrd_skip = 1;
03166                 if (marker->cm_flags & CM_END)
03167                         msrd->msrd_skip = 0;
03168 
03169                 RETURN(0);
03170         }
03171 
03172         if (msrd->msrd_skip)
03173                 RETURN(0);
03174 
03175         if (lcfg->lcfg_command != LCFG_SPTLRPC_CONF) {
03176                 CERROR("invalid command (%x)\n", lcfg->lcfg_command);
03177                 RETURN(0);
03178         }
03179 
03180         svname = lustre_cfg_string(lcfg, 0);
03181         if (svname == NULL) {
03182                 CERROR("svname is empty\n");
03183                 RETURN(0);
03184         }
03185 
03186         param = lustre_cfg_string(lcfg, 1);
03187         if (param == NULL) {
03188                 CERROR("param is empty\n");
03189                 RETURN(0);
03190         }
03191 
03192         rc = mgs_srpc_set_param_mem(msrd->msrd_fsdb, svname, param);
03193         if (rc)
03194                 CERROR("read sptlrpc record error (%d): %s\n", rc, param);
03195 
03196         RETURN(0);
03197 }
03198 
03199 int mgs_get_fsdb_srpc_from_llog(const struct lu_env *env,
03200                                 struct mgs_device *mgs,
03201                                 struct fs_db *fsdb)
03202 {
03203         struct llog_handle        *llh = NULL;
03204         struct llog_ctxt          *ctxt;
03205         char                      *logname;
03206         struct mgs_srpc_read_data  msrd;
03207         int                        rc;
03208         ENTRY;
03209 
03210         /* construct log name */
03211         rc = name_create(&logname, fsdb->fsdb_name, "-sptlrpc");
03212         if (rc)
03213                 RETURN(rc);
03214 
03215         ctxt = llog_get_context(mgs->mgs_obd, LLOG_CONFIG_ORIG_CTXT);
03216         LASSERT(ctxt != NULL);
03217 
03218         if (mgs_log_is_empty(env, mgs, logname))
03219                 GOTO(out, rc = 0);
03220 
03221         rc = llog_open(env, ctxt, &llh, NULL, logname,
03222                        LLOG_OPEN_EXISTS);
03223         if (rc < 0) {
03224                 if (rc == -ENOENT)
03225                         rc = 0;
03226                 GOTO(out, rc);
03227         }
03228 
03229         rc = llog_init_handle(env, llh, LLOG_F_IS_PLAIN, NULL);
03230         if (rc)
03231                 GOTO(out_close, rc);
03232 
03233         if (llog_get_size(llh) <= 1)
03234                 GOTO(out_close, rc = 0);
03235 
03236         msrd.msrd_fsdb = fsdb;
03237         msrd.msrd_skip = 0;
03238 
03239         rc = llog_process(env, llh, mgs_srpc_read_handler, (void *)&msrd,
03240                           NULL);
03241 
03242 out_close:
03243         llog_close(env, llh);
03244 out:
03245         llog_ctxt_put(ctxt);
03246         name_destroy(&logname);
03247 
03248         if (rc)
03249                 CERROR("failed to read sptlrpc config database: %d\n", rc);
03250         RETURN(rc);
03251 }
03252 
03253 /* Permanent settings of all parameters by writing into the appropriate
03254  * configuration logs.
03255  * A parameter with null value ("<param>='\0'") means to erase it out of
03256  * the logs.
03257  */
03258 static int mgs_write_log_param(const struct lu_env *env,
03259                                struct mgs_device *mgs, struct fs_db *fsdb,
03260                                struct mgs_target_info *mti, char *ptr)
03261 {
03262         struct mgs_thread_info *mgi = mgs_env_info(env);
03263         char *logname;
03264         char *tmp;
03265         int rc = 0, rc2 = 0;
03266         ENTRY;
03267 
03268         /* For various parameter settings, we have to figure out which logs
03269            care about them (e.g. both mdt and client for lov settings) */
03270         CDEBUG(D_MGS, "next param '%s'\n", ptr);
03271 
03272         /* The params are stored in MOUNT_DATA_FILE and modified via
03273            tunefs.lustre, or set using lctl conf_param */
03274 
03275         /* Processed in lustre_start_mgc */
03276         if (class_match_param(ptr, PARAM_MGSNODE, NULL) == 0)
03277                 GOTO(end, rc);
03278 
03279         /* Processed in ost/mdt */
03280         if (class_match_param(ptr, PARAM_NETWORK, NULL) == 0)
03281                 GOTO(end, rc);
03282 
03283         /* Processed in mgs_write_log_ost */
03284         if (class_match_param(ptr, PARAM_FAILMODE, NULL) == 0) {
03285                 if (mti->mti_flags & LDD_F_PARAM) {
03286                         LCONSOLE_ERROR_MSG(0x169, "%s can only be "
03287                                            "changed with tunefs.lustre"
03288                                            "and --writeconf\n", ptr);
03289                         rc = -EPERM;
03290                 }
03291                 GOTO(end, rc);
03292         }
03293 
03294         if (class_match_param(ptr, PARAM_SRPC, NULL) == 0) {
03295                 rc = mgs_srpc_set_param(env, mgs, fsdb, mti, ptr);
03296                 GOTO(end, rc);
03297         }
03298 
03299         if (class_match_param(ptr, PARAM_FAILNODE, NULL) == 0) {
03300                 /* Add a failover nidlist */
03301                 rc = 0;
03302                 /* We already processed failovers params for new
03303                    targets in mgs_write_log_target */
03304                 if (mti->mti_flags & LDD_F_PARAM) {
03305                         CDEBUG(D_MGS, "Adding failnode\n");
03306                         rc = mgs_write_log_add_failnid(env, mgs, fsdb, mti);
03307                 }
03308                 GOTO(end, rc);
03309         }
03310 
03311         if (class_match_param(ptr, PARAM_SYS, &tmp) == 0) {
03312                 rc = mgs_write_log_sys(env, mgs, fsdb, mti, ptr, tmp);
03313                 GOTO(end, rc);
03314         }
03315 
03316         if (class_match_param(ptr, PARAM_QUOTA, &tmp) == 0) {
03317                 rc = mgs_write_log_quota(env, mgs, fsdb, mti, ptr, tmp);
03318                 GOTO(end, rc);
03319         }
03320 
03321         if (class_match_param(ptr, PARAM_OSC PARAM_ACTIVE, &tmp) == 0 ||
03322             class_match_param(ptr, PARAM_MDC PARAM_ACTIVE, &tmp) == 0) {
03323                 /* active=0 means off, anything else means on */
03324                 int flag = (*tmp == '0') ? CM_EXCLUDE : 0;
03325                 bool deactive_osc = memcmp(ptr, PARAM_OSC PARAM_ACTIVE,
03326                                           strlen(PARAM_OSC PARAM_ACTIVE)) == 0;
03327                 int i;
03328 
03329                 if (!deactive_osc) {
03330                         __u32   index;
03331 
03332                         rc = server_name2index(mti->mti_svname, &index, NULL);
03333                         if (rc < 0)
03334                                 GOTO(end, rc);
03335 
03336                         if (index == 0) {
03337                                 LCONSOLE_ERROR_MSG(0x144, "%s: MDC0 can not be"
03338                                                    " (de)activated.\n",
03339                                                    mti->mti_svname);
03340                                 GOTO(end, rc = -EINVAL);
03341                         }
03342                 }
03343 
03344                 LCONSOLE_WARN("Permanently %sactivating %s\n",
03345                               flag ? "de" : "re", mti->mti_svname);
03346                 /* Modify clilov */
03347                 rc = name_create(&logname, mti->mti_fsname, "-client");
03348                 if (rc < 0)
03349                         GOTO(end, rc);
03350                 rc = mgs_modify(env, mgs, fsdb, mti, logname,
03351                                 mti->mti_svname,
03352                                 deactive_osc ? "add osc" : "add mdc", flag);
03353                 name_destroy(&logname);
03354                 if (rc < 0)
03355                         goto active_err;
03356 
03357                 /* Modify mdtlov */
03358                 /* Add to all MDT logs for DNE */
03359                 for (i = 0; i < INDEX_MAP_SIZE * 8; i++) {
03360                         if (!test_bit(i, fsdb->fsdb_mdt_index_map))
03361                                 continue;
03362                         rc = name_create_mdt(&logname, mti->mti_fsname, i);
03363                         if (rc < 0)
03364                                 GOTO(end, rc);
03365                         rc = mgs_modify(env, mgs, fsdb, mti, logname,
03366                                         mti->mti_svname,
03367                                         deactive_osc ? "add osc" : "add osp",
03368                                         flag);
03369                         name_destroy(&logname);
03370                         if (rc < 0)
03371                                 goto active_err;
03372                 }
03373 active_err:
03374                 if (rc < 0) {
03375                         LCONSOLE_ERROR_MSG(0x145, "Couldn't find %s in"
03376                                            "log (%d). No permanent "
03377                                            "changes were made to the "
03378                                            "config log.\n",
03379                                            mti->mti_svname, rc);
03380                         if (test_bit(FSDB_OLDLOG14, &fsdb->fsdb_flags))
03381                                 LCONSOLE_ERROR_MSG(0x146, "This may be"
03382                                                    " because the log"
03383                                                    "is in the old 1.4"
03384                                                    "style. Consider "
03385                                                    " --writeconf to "
03386                                                    "update the logs.\n");
03387                         GOTO(end, rc);
03388                 }
03389                 /* Fall through to osc/mdc proc for deactivating live
03390                    OSC/OSP on running MDT / clients. */
03391         }
03392         /* Below here, let obd's XXX_process_config methods handle it */
03393 
03394         /* All lov. in proc */
03395         if (class_match_param(ptr, PARAM_LOV, NULL) == 0) {
03396                 char *mdtlovname;
03397 
03398                 CDEBUG(D_MGS, "lov param %s\n", ptr);
03399                 if (!(mti->mti_flags & LDD_F_SV_TYPE_MDT)) {
03400                         LCONSOLE_ERROR_MSG(0x147, "LOV params must be "
03401                                            "set on the MDT, not %s. "
03402                                            "Ignoring.\n",
03403                                            mti->mti_svname);
03404                         GOTO(end, rc = 0);
03405                 }
03406 
03407                 /* Modify mdtlov */
03408                 if (mgs_log_is_empty(env, mgs, mti->mti_svname))
03409                         GOTO(end, rc = -ENODEV);
03410 
03411                 rc = name_create_mdt_and_lov(&logname, &mdtlovname, fsdb,
03412                                              mti->mti_stripe_index);
03413                 if (rc)
03414                         GOTO(end, rc);
03415                 rc = mgs_wlp_lcfg(env, mgs, fsdb, mti, mti->mti_svname,
03416                                   &mgi->mgi_bufs, mdtlovname, ptr);
03417                 name_destroy(&logname);
03418                 name_destroy(&mdtlovname);
03419                 if (rc)
03420                         GOTO(end, rc);
03421 
03422                 /* Modify clilov */
03423                 rc = name_create(&logname, mti->mti_fsname, "-client");
03424                 if (rc)
03425                         GOTO(end, rc);
03426                 rc = mgs_wlp_lcfg(env, mgs, fsdb, mti, logname, &mgi->mgi_bufs,
03427                                   fsdb->fsdb_clilov, ptr);
03428                 name_destroy(&logname);
03429                 GOTO(end, rc);
03430         }
03431 
03432         /* All osc., mdc., llite. params in proc */
03433         if ((class_match_param(ptr, PARAM_OSC, NULL) == 0) ||
03434             (class_match_param(ptr, PARAM_MDC, NULL) == 0) ||
03435             (class_match_param(ptr, PARAM_LLITE, NULL) == 0)) {
03436                 char *cname;
03437 
03438                 if (test_bit(FSDB_OLDLOG14, &fsdb->fsdb_flags)) {
03439                         LCONSOLE_ERROR_MSG(0x148, "Upgraded client logs for %s"
03440                                            " cannot be modified. Consider"
03441                                            " updating the configuration with"
03442                                            " --writeconf\n",
03443                                            mti->mti_svname);
03444                         GOTO(end, rc = -EINVAL);
03445                 }
03446                 if (memcmp(ptr, PARAM_LLITE, strlen(PARAM_LLITE)) == 0) {
03447                         rc = name_create(&cname, mti->mti_fsname, "-client");
03448                         /* Add the client type to match the obdname in
03449                            class_config_llog_handler */
03450                 } else if (mti->mti_flags & LDD_F_SV_TYPE_MDT) {
03451                         rc = name_create(&cname, mti->mti_svname, "-mdc");
03452                 } else if (mti->mti_flags & LDD_F_SV_TYPE_OST) {
03453                         rc = name_create(&cname, mti->mti_svname, "-osc");
03454                 } else {
03455                         GOTO(end, rc = -EINVAL);
03456                 }
03457                 if (rc)
03458                         GOTO(end, rc);
03459 
03460                 /* Forbid direct update of llite root squash parameters.
03461                  * These parameters are indirectly set via the MDT settings.
03462                  * See (LU-1778) */
03463                 if ((class_match_param(ptr, PARAM_LLITE, &tmp) == 0) &&
03464                     ((memcmp(tmp, "root_squash=", 12) == 0) ||
03465                      (memcmp(tmp, "nosquash_nids=", 14) == 0))) {
03466                         LCONSOLE_ERROR("%s: root squash parameters can only "
03467                                 "be updated through MDT component\n",
03468                                 mti->mti_fsname);
03469                         name_destroy(&cname);
03470                         GOTO(end, rc = -EINVAL);
03471                 }
03472 
03473                 CDEBUG(D_MGS, "%.3s param %s\n", ptr, ptr + 4);
03474 
03475                 /* Modify client */
03476                 rc = name_create(&logname, mti->mti_fsname, "-client");
03477                 if (rc) {
03478                         name_destroy(&cname);
03479                         GOTO(end, rc);
03480                 }
03481                 rc = mgs_wlp_lcfg(env, mgs, fsdb, mti, logname, &mgi->mgi_bufs,
03482                                   cname, ptr);
03483 
03484                 /* osc params affect the MDT as well */
03485                 if (!rc && (mti->mti_flags & LDD_F_SV_TYPE_OST)) {
03486                         int i;
03487 
03488                         for (i = 0; i < INDEX_MAP_SIZE * 8; i++){
03489                                 if (!test_bit(i, fsdb->fsdb_mdt_index_map))
03490                                         continue;
03491                                 name_destroy(&cname);
03492                                 rc = name_create_mdt_osc(&cname, mti->mti_svname,
03493                                                          fsdb, i);
03494                                 name_destroy(&logname);
03495                                 if (rc)
03496                                         break;
03497                                 rc = name_create_mdt(&logname,
03498                                                      mti->mti_fsname, i);
03499                                 if (rc)
03500                                         break;
03501                                 if (!mgs_log_is_empty(env, mgs, logname)) {
03502                                         rc = mgs_wlp_lcfg(env, mgs, fsdb,
03503                                                           mti, logname,
03504                                                           &mgi->mgi_bufs,
03505                                                           cname, ptr);
03506                                         if (rc)
03507                                                 break;
03508                                 }
03509                         }
03510                 }
03511 
03512                 /* For mdc activate/deactivate, it affects OSP on MDT as well */
03513                 if (class_match_param(ptr, PARAM_MDC PARAM_ACTIVE, &tmp) == 0 &&
03514                     rc == 0) {
03515                         char suffix[16];
03516                         char *lodname = NULL;
03517                         char *param_str = NULL;
03518                         int i;
03519                         int index;
03520 
03521                         /* replace mdc with osp */
03522                         memcpy(ptr, PARAM_OSP, strlen(PARAM_OSP));
03523                         rc = server_name2index(mti->mti_svname, &index, NULL);
03524                         if (rc < 0) {
03525                                 memcpy(ptr, PARAM_MDC, strlen(PARAM_MDC));
03526                                 GOTO(end, rc);
03527                         }
03528 
03529                         for (i = 0; i < INDEX_MAP_SIZE * 8; i++) {
03530                                 if (!test_bit(i, fsdb->fsdb_mdt_index_map))
03531                                         continue;
03532 
03533                                 if (i == index)
03534                                         continue;
03535 
03536                                 name_destroy(&logname);
03537                                 rc = name_create_mdt(&logname, mti->mti_fsname,
03538                                                      i);
03539                                 if (rc < 0)
03540                                         break;
03541 
03542                                 if (mgs_log_is_empty(env, mgs, logname))
03543                                         continue;
03544 
03545                                 snprintf(suffix, sizeof(suffix), "-osp-MDT%04x",
03546                                          i);
03547                                 name_destroy(&cname);
03548                                 rc = name_create(&cname, mti->mti_svname,
03549                                                  suffix);
03550                                 if (rc < 0)
03551                                         break;
03552 
03553                                 rc = mgs_wlp_lcfg(env, mgs, fsdb, mti, logname,
03554                                                   &mgi->mgi_bufs, cname, ptr);
03555                                 if (rc < 0)
03556                                         break;
03557 
03558                                 /* Add configuration log for noitfying LOD
03559                                  * to active/deactive the OSP. */
03560                                 name_destroy(&param_str);
03561                                 rc = name_create(&param_str, cname,
03562                                                  (*tmp == '0') ?  ".active=0" :
03563                                                  ".active=1");
03564                                 if (rc < 0)
03565                                         break;
03566 
03567                                 name_destroy(&lodname);
03568                                 rc = name_create(&lodname, logname, "-mdtlov");
03569                                 if (rc < 0)
03570                                         break;
03571 
03572                                 rc = mgs_wlp_lcfg(env, mgs, fsdb, mti, logname,
03573                                                   &mgi->mgi_bufs, lodname,
03574                                                   param_str);
03575                                 if (rc < 0)
03576                                         break;
03577                         }
03578                         memcpy(ptr, PARAM_MDC, strlen(PARAM_MDC));
03579                         name_destroy(&lodname);
03580                         name_destroy(&param_str);
03581                 }
03582 
03583                 name_destroy(&logname);
03584                 name_destroy(&cname);
03585                 GOTO(end, rc);
03586         }
03587 
03588         /* All mdt. params in proc */
03589         if (class_match_param(ptr, PARAM_MDT, &tmp) == 0) {
03590                 int i;
03591                 __u32 idx;
03592 
03593                 CDEBUG(D_MGS, "%.3s param %s\n", ptr, ptr + 4);
03594                 if (strncmp(mti->mti_svname, mti->mti_fsname,
03595                             MTI_NAME_MAXLEN) == 0)
03596                         /* device is unspecified completely? */
03597                         rc = LDD_F_SV_TYPE_MDT | LDD_F_SV_ALL;
03598                 else
03599                         rc = server_name2index(mti->mti_svname, &idx, NULL);
03600                 if (rc < 0)
03601                         goto active_err;
03602                 if ((rc & LDD_F_SV_TYPE_MDT) == 0)
03603                         goto active_err;
03604                 if (rc & LDD_F_SV_ALL) {
03605                         for (i = 0; i < INDEX_MAP_SIZE * 8; i++) {
03606                                 if (!test_bit(i,
03607                                                   fsdb->fsdb_mdt_index_map))
03608                                         continue;
03609                                 rc = name_create_mdt(&logname,
03610                                                 mti->mti_fsname, i);
03611                                 if (rc)
03612                                         goto active_err;
03613                                 rc = mgs_wlp_lcfg(env, mgs, fsdb, mti,
03614                                                   logname, &mgi->mgi_bufs,
03615                                                   logname, ptr);
03616                                 name_destroy(&logname);
03617                                 if (rc)
03618                                         goto active_err;
03619                         }
03620                 } else {
03621                         if ((memcmp(tmp, "root_squash=", 12) == 0) ||
03622                             (memcmp(tmp, "nosquash_nids=", 14) == 0)) {
03623                                 LCONSOLE_ERROR("%s: root squash parameters "
03624                                         "cannot be applied to a single MDT\n",
03625                                         mti->mti_fsname);
03626                                 GOTO(end, rc = -EINVAL);
03627                         }
03628                         rc = mgs_wlp_lcfg(env, mgs, fsdb, mti,
03629                                           mti->mti_svname, &mgi->mgi_bufs,
03630                                           mti->mti_svname, ptr);
03631                         if (rc)
03632                                 goto active_err;
03633                 }
03634 
03635                 /* root squash settings are also applied to llite
03636                  * config log (see LU-1778) */
03637                 if (rc == 0 &&
03638                     ((memcmp(tmp, "root_squash=", 12) == 0) ||
03639                      (memcmp(tmp, "nosquash_nids=", 14) == 0))) {
03640                         char *cname;
03641                         char *ptr2;
03642 
03643                         rc = name_create(&cname, mti->mti_fsname, "-client");
03644                         if (rc)
03645                                 GOTO(end, rc);
03646                         rc = name_create(&logname, mti->mti_fsname, "-client");
03647                         if (rc) {
03648                                 name_destroy(&cname);
03649                                 GOTO(end, rc);
03650                         }
03651                         rc = name_create(&ptr2, PARAM_LLITE, tmp);
03652                         if (rc) {
03653                                 name_destroy(&cname);
03654                                 name_destroy(&logname);
03655                                 GOTO(end, rc);
03656                         }
03657                         rc = mgs_wlp_lcfg(env, mgs, fsdb, mti, logname,
03658                                           &mgi->mgi_bufs, cname, ptr2);
03659                         name_destroy(&ptr2);
03660                         name_destroy(&logname);
03661                         name_destroy(&cname);
03662                 }
03663                 GOTO(end, rc);
03664         }
03665 
03666         /* All mdd., ost. and osd. params in proc */
03667         if ((class_match_param(ptr, PARAM_MDD, NULL) == 0) ||
03668             (class_match_param(ptr, PARAM_OST, NULL) == 0) ||
03669             (class_match_param(ptr, PARAM_OSD, NULL) == 0)) {
03670                 CDEBUG(D_MGS, "%.3s param %s\n", ptr, ptr + 4);
03671                 if (mgs_log_is_empty(env, mgs, mti->mti_svname))
03672                         GOTO(end, rc = -ENODEV);
03673 
03674                 rc = mgs_wlp_lcfg(env, mgs, fsdb, mti, mti->mti_svname,
03675                                   &mgi->mgi_bufs, mti->mti_svname, ptr);
03676                 GOTO(end, rc);
03677         }
03678 
03679         LCONSOLE_WARN("Ignoring unrecognized param '%s'\n", ptr);
03680         rc2 = -ENOSYS;
03681 
03682 end:
03683         if (rc)
03684                 CERROR("err %d on param '%s'\n", rc, ptr);
03685 
03686         RETURN(rc ?: rc2);
03687 }
03688 
03689 /* Not implementing automatic failover nid addition at this time. */
03690 int mgs_check_failnid(const struct lu_env *env, struct mgs_device *mgs,
03691                       struct mgs_target_info *mti)
03692 {
03693 #if 0
03694         struct fs_db *fsdb;
03695         int rc;
03696         ENTRY;
03697 
03698         rc = mgs_find_or_make_fsdb(obd, fsname, &fsdb);
03699         if (rc)
03700                 RETURN(rc);
03701 
03702         if (mgs_log_is_empty(obd, mti->mti_svname))
03703                 /* should never happen */
03704                 RETURN(-ENOENT);
03705 
03706         CDEBUG(D_MGS, "Checking for new failnids for %s\n", mti->mti_svname);
03707 
03708         /* FIXME We can just check mti->params to see if we're already in
03709            the failover list.  Modify mti->params for rewriting back at
03710            server_register_target(). */
03711 
03712         mutex_lock(&fsdb->fsdb_mutex);
03713         rc = mgs_write_log_add_failnid(obd, fsdb, mti);
03714         mutex_unlock(&fsdb->fsdb_mutex);
03715         char    *buf, *params;
03716         int      rc = -EINVAL;
03717 
03718         RETURN(rc);
03719 #endif
03720         return 0;
03721 }
03722 
03723 int mgs_write_log_target(const struct lu_env *env, struct mgs_device *mgs,
03724                          struct mgs_target_info *mti, struct fs_db *fsdb)
03725 {
03726         char    *buf, *params;
03727         int      rc = -EINVAL;
03728 
03729         ENTRY;
03730 
03731         /* set/check the new target index */
03732         rc = mgs_set_index(env, mgs, mti);
03733         if (rc < 0)
03734                 RETURN(rc);
03735 
03736         if (rc == EALREADY) {
03737                 LCONSOLE_WARN("Found index %d for %s, updating log\n",
03738                               mti->mti_stripe_index, mti->mti_svname);
03739                 /* We would like to mark old log sections as invalid
03740                    and add new log sections in the client and mdt logs.
03741                    But if we add new sections, then live clients will
03742                    get repeat setup instructions for already running
03743                    osc's. So don't update the client/mdt logs. */
03744                 mti->mti_flags &= ~LDD_F_UPDATE;
03745                 rc = 0;
03746         }
03747 
03748         mutex_lock(&fsdb->fsdb_mutex);
03749 
03750         if (mti->mti_flags &
03751             (LDD_F_VIRGIN | LDD_F_UPGRADE14 | LDD_F_WRITECONF)) {
03752                 /* Generate a log from scratch */
03753                 if (mti->mti_flags & LDD_F_SV_TYPE_MDT) {
03754                         rc = mgs_write_log_mdt(env, mgs, fsdb, mti);
03755                 } else if (mti->mti_flags & LDD_F_SV_TYPE_OST) {
03756                         rc = mgs_write_log_ost(env, mgs, fsdb, mti);
03757                 } else {
03758                         CERROR("Unknown target type %#x, can't create log for "
03759                                "%s\n", mti->mti_flags, mti->mti_svname);
03760                 }
03761                 if (rc) {
03762                         CERROR("Can't write logs for %s (%d)\n",
03763                                mti->mti_svname, rc);
03764                         GOTO(out_up, rc);
03765                 }
03766         } else {
03767                 /* Just update the params from tunefs in mgs_write_log_params */
03768                 CDEBUG(D_MGS, "Update params for %s\n", mti->mti_svname);
03769                 mti->mti_flags |= LDD_F_PARAM;
03770         }
03771 
03772         /* allocate temporary buffer, where class_get_next_param will
03773            make copy of a current  parameter */
03774         OBD_ALLOC(buf, strlen(mti->mti_params) + 1);
03775         if (buf == NULL)
03776                 GOTO(out_up, rc = -ENOMEM);
03777         params = mti->mti_params;
03778         while (params != NULL) {
03779                 rc = class_get_next_param(&params, buf);
03780                 if (rc) {
03781                         if (rc == 1)
03782                                 /* there is no next parameter, that is
03783                                    not an error */
03784                                 rc = 0;
03785                         break;
03786                 }
03787                 CDEBUG(D_MGS, "remaining string: '%s', param: '%s'\n",
03788                        params, buf);
03789                 rc = mgs_write_log_param(env, mgs, fsdb, mti, buf);
03790                 if (rc)
03791                         break;
03792         }
03793 
03794         OBD_FREE(buf, strlen(mti->mti_params) + 1);
03795 
03796 out_up:
03797         mutex_unlock(&fsdb->fsdb_mutex);
03798         RETURN(rc);
03799 }
03800 
03801 int mgs_erase_log(const struct lu_env *env, struct mgs_device *mgs, char *name)
03802 {
03803         struct llog_ctxt        *ctxt;
03804         int                      rc = 0;
03805 
03806         ctxt = llog_get_context(mgs->mgs_obd, LLOG_CONFIG_ORIG_CTXT);
03807         if (ctxt == NULL) {
03808                 CERROR("%s: MGS config context doesn't exist\n",
03809                        mgs->mgs_obd->obd_name);
03810                 rc = -ENODEV;
03811         } else {
03812                 rc = llog_erase(env, ctxt, NULL, name);
03813                 /* llog may not exist */
03814                 if (rc == -ENOENT)
03815                         rc = 0;
03816                 llog_ctxt_put(ctxt);
03817         }
03818 
03819         if (rc)
03820                 CERROR("%s: failed to clear log %s: %d\n",
03821                        mgs->mgs_obd->obd_name, name, rc);
03822 
03823         return rc;
03824 }
03825 
03826 /* erase all logs for the given fs */
03827 int mgs_erase_logs(const struct lu_env *env, struct mgs_device *mgs, char *fsname)
03828 {
03829         struct fs_db *fsdb;
03830         struct list_head log_list;
03831         struct mgs_direntry *dirent, *n;
03832         int rc, len = strlen(fsname);
03833         char *suffix;
03834         ENTRY;
03835 
03836         /* Find all the logs in the CONFIGS directory */
03837         rc = class_dentry_readdir(env, mgs, &log_list);
03838         if (rc)
03839                 RETURN(rc);
03840 
03841         mutex_lock(&mgs->mgs_mutex);
03842 
03843         /* Delete the fs db */
03844         fsdb = mgs_find_fsdb(mgs, fsname);
03845         if (fsdb)
03846                 mgs_free_fsdb(mgs, fsdb);
03847 
03848         mutex_unlock(&mgs->mgs_mutex);
03849 
03850         list_for_each_entry_safe(dirent, n, &log_list, mde_list) {
03851                 list_del_init(&dirent->mde_list);
03852                 suffix = strrchr(dirent->mde_name, '-');
03853                 if (suffix != NULL) {
03854                         if ((len == suffix - dirent->mde_name) &&
03855                             (strncmp(fsname, dirent->mde_name, len) == 0)) {
03856                                 CDEBUG(D_MGS, "Removing log %s\n",
03857                                        dirent->mde_name);
03858                                 mgs_erase_log(env, mgs, dirent->mde_name);
03859                         }
03860                 }
03861                 mgs_direntry_free(dirent);
03862         }
03863 
03864         RETURN(rc);
03865 }
03866 
03867 /* list all logs for the given fs */
03868 int mgs_list_logs(const struct lu_env *env, struct mgs_device *mgs,
03869                   struct obd_ioctl_data *data)
03870 {
03871         struct list_head         log_list;
03872         struct mgs_direntry     *dirent, *n;
