03873         char                    *out, *suffix;
03874         int                      l, remains, rc;
03875 
03876         ENTRY;
03877 
03878         /* Find all the logs in the CONFIGS directory */
03879         rc = class_dentry_readdir(env, mgs, &log_list);
03880         if (rc)
03881                 RETURN(rc);
03882 
03883         out = data->ioc_bulk;
03884         remains = data->ioc_inllen1;
03885         list_for_each_entry_safe(dirent, n, &log_list, mde_list) {
03886                 list_del_init(&dirent->mde_list);
03887                 suffix = strrchr(dirent->mde_name, '-');
03888                 if (suffix != NULL) {
03889                         l = snprintf(out, remains, "config log: $%s\n",
03890                                      dirent->mde_name);
03891                         out += l;
03892                         remains -= l;
03893                 }
03894                 mgs_direntry_free(dirent);
03895                 if (remains <= 0)
03896                         break;
03897         }
03898         RETURN(rc);
03899 }
03900 
03901 /* from llog_swab */
03902 static void print_lustre_cfg(struct lustre_cfg *lcfg)
03903 {
03904         int i;
03905         ENTRY;
03906 
03907         CDEBUG(D_MGS, "lustre_cfg: %p\n", lcfg);
03908         CDEBUG(D_MGS, "\tlcfg->lcfg_version: %#x\n", lcfg->lcfg_version);
03909 
03910         CDEBUG(D_MGS, "\tlcfg->lcfg_command: %#x\n", lcfg->lcfg_command);
03911         CDEBUG(D_MGS, "\tlcfg->lcfg_num: %#x\n", lcfg->lcfg_num);
03912         CDEBUG(D_MGS, "\tlcfg->lcfg_flags: %#x\n", lcfg->lcfg_flags);
03913         CDEBUG(D_MGS, "\tlcfg->lcfg_nid: %s\n", libcfs_nid2str(lcfg->lcfg_nid));
03914 
03915         CDEBUG(D_MGS, "\tlcfg->lcfg_bufcount: %d\n", lcfg->lcfg_bufcount);
03916         if (lcfg->lcfg_bufcount < LUSTRE_CFG_MAX_BUFCOUNT)
03917                 for (i = 0; i < lcfg->lcfg_bufcount; i++) {
03918                         CDEBUG(D_MGS, "\tlcfg->lcfg_buflens[%d]: %d %s\n",
03919                                i, lcfg->lcfg_buflens[i],
03920                                lustre_cfg_string(lcfg, i));
03921                 }
03922         EXIT;
03923 }
03924 
03925 /* Setup _mgs fsdb and log
03926  */
03927 int mgs__mgs_fsdb_setup(const struct lu_env *env, struct mgs_device *mgs,
03928                           struct fs_db *fsdb)
03929 {
03930         int                     rc;
03931         ENTRY;
03932 
03933         rc = mgs_find_or_make_fsdb(env, mgs, MGSSELF_NAME, &fsdb);
03934 
03935         RETURN(rc);
03936 }
03937 
03938 /* Setup params fsdb and log
03939  */
03940 int mgs_params_fsdb_setup(const struct lu_env *env, struct mgs_device *mgs,
03941                           struct fs_db *fsdb)
03942 {
03943         struct llog_handle      *params_llh = NULL;
03944         int                     rc;
03945         ENTRY;
03946 
03947         rc = mgs_find_or_make_fsdb(env, mgs, PARAMS_FILENAME, &fsdb);
03948         if (fsdb != NULL) {
03949                 mutex_lock(&fsdb->fsdb_mutex);
03950                 rc = record_start_log(env, mgs, &params_llh, PARAMS_FILENAME);
03951                 if (rc == 0)
03952                         rc = record_end_log(env, &params_llh);
03953                 mutex_unlock(&fsdb->fsdb_mutex);
03954         }
03955 
03956         RETURN(rc);
03957 }
03958 
03959 /* Cleanup params fsdb and log
03960  */
03961 int mgs_params_fsdb_cleanup(const struct lu_env *env, struct mgs_device *mgs)
03962 {
03963         return mgs_erase_logs(env, mgs, PARAMS_FILENAME);
03964 }
03965 
03966 /* Set a permanent (config log) param for a target or fs
03967  * \param lcfg buf0 may contain the device (testfs-MDT0000) name
03968  *             buf1 contains the single parameter
03969  */
03970 int mgs_setparam(const struct lu_env *env, struct mgs_device *mgs,
03971                  struct lustre_cfg *lcfg, char *fsname)
03972 {
03973         struct fs_db *fsdb;
03974         struct mgs_target_info *mti;
03975         char *devname, *param;
03976         char *ptr;
03977         const char *tmp;
03978         __u32 index;
03979         int rc = 0;
03980         ENTRY;
03981 
03982         print_lustre_cfg(lcfg);
03983 
03984         /* lustre, lustre-mdtlov, lustre-client, lustre-MDT0000 */
03985         devname = lustre_cfg_string(lcfg, 0);
03986         param = lustre_cfg_string(lcfg, 1);
03987         if (!devname) {
03988                 /* Assume device name embedded in param:
03989                    lustre-OST0000.osc.max_dirty_mb=32 */
03990                 ptr = strchr(param, '.');
03991                 if (ptr) {
03992                         devname = param;
03993                         *ptr = 0;
03994                         param = ptr + 1;
03995                 }
03996         }
03997         if (!devname) {
03998                 LCONSOLE_ERROR_MSG(0x14d, "No target specified: %s\n", param);
03999                 RETURN(-ENOSYS);
04000         }
04001 
04002         rc = mgs_parse_devname(devname, fsname, NULL);
04003         if (rc == 0 && !mgs_parse_devname(devname, NULL, &index)) {
04004                 /* param related to llite isn't allowed to set by OST or MDT */
04005                 if (rc == 0 && strncmp(param, PARAM_LLITE,
04006                                        sizeof(PARAM_LLITE) - 1) == 0)
04007                         RETURN(-EINVAL);
04008         } else {
04009                 /* assume devname is the fsname */
04010                 strlcpy(fsname, devname, MTI_NAME_MAXLEN);
04011         }
04012         CDEBUG(D_MGS, "setparam fs='%s' device='%s'\n", fsname, devname);
04013 
04014         rc = mgs_find_or_make_fsdb(env, mgs,
04015                                    lcfg->lcfg_command == LCFG_SET_PARAM ?
04016                                    PARAMS_FILENAME : fsname, &fsdb);
04017         if (rc)
04018                 RETURN(rc);
04019 
04020         if (lcfg->lcfg_command != LCFG_SET_PARAM &&
04021             !test_bit(FSDB_MGS_SELF, &fsdb->fsdb_flags) &&
04022             test_bit(FSDB_LOG_EMPTY, &fsdb->fsdb_flags)) {
04023                 CERROR("No filesystem targets for %s.  cfg_device from lctl "
04024                        "is '%s'\n", fsname, devname);
04025                 mgs_free_fsdb(mgs, fsdb);
04026                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
04027         }
04028 
04029         /* Create a fake mti to hold everything */
04030         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(mti);
04031         if (!mti)
04032                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOMEM);
04033         if (strlcpy(mti->mti_fsname, fsname, sizeof(mti->mti_fsname))
04034             >= sizeof(mti->mti_fsname))
04035                 GOTO(out, rc = -E2BIG);
04036         if (strlcpy(mti->mti_svname, devname, sizeof(mti->mti_svname))
04037             >= sizeof(mti->mti_svname))
04038                 GOTO(out, rc = -E2BIG);
04039         if (strlcpy(mti->mti_params, param, sizeof(mti->mti_params))
04040             >= sizeof(mti->mti_params))
04041                 GOTO(out, rc = -E2BIG);
04042         rc = server_name2index(mti->mti_svname, &mti->mti_stripe_index, &tmp);
04043         if (rc < 0)
04044                 /* Not a valid server; may be only fsname */
04045                 rc = 0;
04046         else
04047                 /* Strip -osc or -mdc suffix from svname */
04048                 if (server_make_name(rc, mti->mti_stripe_index, mti->mti_fsname,
04049                                      mti->mti_svname))
04050                         GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
04051         /*
04052          * Revoke lock so everyone updates.  Should be alright if
04053          * someone was already reading while we were updating the logs,
04054          * so we don't really need to hold the lock while we're
04055          * writing (above).
04056          */
04057         if (lcfg->lcfg_command == LCFG_SET_PARAM) {
04058                 mti->mti_flags = rc | LDD_F_PARAM2;
04059                 mutex_lock(&fsdb->fsdb_mutex);
04060                 rc = mgs_write_log_param2(env, mgs, fsdb, mti, mti->mti_params);
04061                 mutex_unlock(&fsdb->fsdb_mutex);
04062                 mgs_revoke_lock(mgs, fsdb, CONFIG_T_PARAMS);
04063         } else {
04064                 mti->mti_flags = rc | LDD_F_PARAM;
04065                 mutex_lock(&fsdb->fsdb_mutex);
04066                 rc = mgs_write_log_param(env, mgs, fsdb, mti, mti->mti_params);
04067                 mutex_unlock(&fsdb->fsdb_mutex);
04068                 mgs_revoke_lock(mgs, fsdb, CONFIG_T_CONFIG);
04069         }
04070 
04071 out:
04072         OBD_FREE_PTR(mti);
04073         RETURN(rc);
04074 }
04075 
04076 static int mgs_write_log_pool(const struct lu_env *env,
04077                               struct mgs_device *mgs, char *logname,
04078                               struct fs_db *fsdb, char *tgtname,
04079                               enum lcfg_command_type cmd,
04080                               char *fsname, char *poolname,
04081                               char *ostname, char *comment)
04082 {
04083         struct llog_handle *llh = NULL;
04084         int rc;
04085 
04086         rc = record_start_log(env, mgs, &llh, logname);
04087         if (rc)
04088                 return rc;
04089         rc = record_marker(env, llh, fsdb, CM_START, tgtname, comment);
04090         if (rc)
04091                 goto out;
04092         rc = record_base(env, llh, tgtname, 0, cmd,
04093                          fsname, poolname, ostname, NULL);
04094         if (rc)
04095                 goto out;
04096         rc = record_marker(env, llh, fsdb, CM_END, tgtname, comment);
04097 out:
04098         record_end_log(env, &llh);
04099         return rc;
04100 }
04101 
04102 int mgs_nodemap_cmd(const struct lu_env *env, struct mgs_device *mgs,
04103                     enum lcfg_command_type cmd, const char *nodemap_name,
04104                     char *param)
04105 {
04106         lnet_nid_t      nid[2];
04107         __u32           idmap[2];
04108         bool            bool_switch;
04109         __u32           int_id;
04110         int             rc = 0;
04111         ENTRY;
04112 
04113         switch (cmd) {
04114         case LCFG_NODEMAP_ADD:
04115                 rc = nodemap_add(nodemap_name);
04116                 break;
04117         case LCFG_NODEMAP_DEL:
04118                 rc = nodemap_del(nodemap_name);
04119                 break;
04120         case LCFG_NODEMAP_ADD_RANGE:
04121                 rc = nodemap_parse_range(param, nid);
04122                 if (rc != 0)
04123                         break;
04124                 rc = nodemap_add_range(nodemap_name, nid);
04125                 break;
04126         case LCFG_NODEMAP_DEL_RANGE:
04127                 rc = nodemap_parse_range(param, nid);
04128                 if (rc != 0)
04129                         break;
04130                 rc = nodemap_del_range(nodemap_name, nid);
04131                 break;
04132         case LCFG_NODEMAP_ADMIN:
04133                 bool_switch = simple_strtoul(param, NULL, 10);
04134                 rc = nodemap_set_allow_root(nodemap_name, bool_switch);
04135                 break;
04136         case LCFG_NODEMAP_TRUSTED:
04137                 bool_switch = simple_strtoul(param, NULL, 10);
04138                 rc = nodemap_set_trust_client_ids(nodemap_name, bool_switch);
04139                 break;
04140         case LCFG_NODEMAP_SQUASH_UID:
04141                 int_id = simple_strtoul(param, NULL, 10);
04142                 rc = nodemap_set_squash_uid(nodemap_name, int_id);
04143                 break;
04144         case LCFG_NODEMAP_SQUASH_GID:
04145                 int_id = simple_strtoul(param, NULL, 10);
04146                 rc = nodemap_set_squash_gid(nodemap_name, int_id);
04147                 break;
04148         case LCFG_NODEMAP_ADD_UIDMAP:
04149         case LCFG_NODEMAP_ADD_GIDMAP:
04150                 rc = nodemap_parse_idmap(param, idmap);
04151                 if (rc != 0)
04152                         break;
04153                 if (cmd == LCFG_NODEMAP_ADD_UIDMAP)
04154                         rc = nodemap_add_idmap(nodemap_name, NODEMAP_UID,
04155                                                idmap);
04156                 else
04157                         rc = nodemap_add_idmap(nodemap_name, NODEMAP_GID,
04158                                                idmap);
04159                 break;
04160         case LCFG_NODEMAP_DEL_UIDMAP:
04161         case LCFG_NODEMAP_DEL_GIDMAP:
04162                 rc = nodemap_parse_idmap(param, idmap);
04163                 if (rc != 0)
04164                         break;
04165                 if (cmd == LCFG_NODEMAP_DEL_UIDMAP)
04166                         rc = nodemap_del_idmap(nodemap_name, NODEMAP_UID,
04167                                                idmap);
04168                 else
04169                         rc = nodemap_del_idmap(nodemap_name, NODEMAP_GID,
04170                                                idmap);
04171                 break;
04172         default:
04173                 rc = -EINVAL;
04174         }
04175 
04176         RETURN(rc);
04177 }
04178 
04179 int mgs_pool_cmd(const struct lu_env *env, struct mgs_device *mgs,
04180                  enum lcfg_command_type cmd, char *fsname,
04181                  char *poolname, char *ostname)
04182 {
04183         struct fs_db *fsdb;
04184         char *lovname;
04185         char *logname;
04186         char *label = NULL, *canceled_label = NULL;
04187         int label_sz;
04188         struct mgs_target_info *mti = NULL;
04189         int rc, i;
04190         ENTRY;
04191 
04192         rc = mgs_find_or_make_fsdb(env, mgs, fsname, &fsdb);
04193         if (rc) {
04194                 CERROR("Can't get db for %s\n", fsname);
04195                 RETURN(rc);
04196         }
04197         if (test_bit(FSDB_LOG_EMPTY, &fsdb->fsdb_flags)) {
04198                 CERROR("%s is not defined\n", fsname);
04199                 mgs_free_fsdb(mgs, fsdb);
04200                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
04201         }
04202 
04203         label_sz = 10 + strlen(fsname) + strlen(poolname);
04204 
04205         /* check if ostname match fsname */
04206         if (ostname != NULL) {
04207                 char *ptr;
04208 
04209                 ptr = strrchr(ostname, '-');
04210                 if ((ptr == NULL) ||
04211                     (strncmp(fsname, ostname, ptr-ostname) != 0))
04212                         RETURN(-EINVAL);
04213                 label_sz += strlen(ostname);
04214         }
04215 
04216         OBD_ALLOC(label, label_sz);
04217         if (label == NULL)
04218                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
04219 
04220         switch(cmd) {
04221         case LCFG_POOL_NEW:
04222                 sprintf(label,
04223                         "new %s.%s", fsname, poolname);
04224                 break;
04225         case LCFG_POOL_ADD:
04226                 sprintf(label,
04227                         "add %s.%s.%s", fsname, poolname, ostname);
04228                 break;
04229         case LCFG_POOL_REM:
04230                 OBD_ALLOC(canceled_label, label_sz);
04231                 if (canceled_label == NULL)
04232                         GOTO(out_label, rc = -ENOMEM);
04233                 sprintf(label,
04234                         "rem %s.%s.%s", fsname, poolname, ostname);
04235                 sprintf(canceled_label,
04236                         "add %s.%s.%s", fsname, poolname, ostname);
04237                 break;
04238         case LCFG_POOL_DEL:
04239                 OBD_ALLOC(canceled_label, label_sz);
04240                 if (canceled_label == NULL)
04241                         GOTO(out_label, rc = -ENOMEM);
04242                 sprintf(label,
04243                         "del %s.%s", fsname, poolname);
04244                 sprintf(canceled_label,
04245                         "new %s.%s", fsname, poolname);
04246                 break;
04247         default:
04248                 break;
04249         }
04250 
04251         if (canceled_label != NULL) {
04252                 OBD_ALLOC_PTR(mti);
04253                 if (mti == NULL)
04254                         GOTO(out_cancel, rc = -ENOMEM);
04255         }
04256 
04257         mutex_lock(&fsdb->fsdb_mutex);
04258         /* write pool def to all MDT logs */
04259         for (i = 0; i < INDEX_MAP_SIZE * 8; i++) {
04260                 if (test_bit(i,  fsdb->fsdb_mdt_index_map)) {
04261                         rc = name_create_mdt_and_lov(&logname, &lovname,
04262                                                      fsdb, i);
04263                         if (rc) {
04264                                 mutex_unlock(&fsdb->fsdb_mutex);
04265                                 GOTO(out_mti, rc);
04266                         }
04267                         if (canceled_label != NULL) {
04268                                 strcpy(mti->mti_svname, "lov pool");
04269                                 rc = mgs_modify(env, mgs, fsdb, mti, logname,
04270                                                 lovname, canceled_label,
04271                                                 CM_SKIP);
04272                         }
04273 
04274                         if (rc >= 0)
04275                                 rc = mgs_write_log_pool(env, mgs, logname,
04276                                                         fsdb, lovname, cmd,
04277                                                         fsname, poolname,
04278                                                         ostname, label);
04279                         name_destroy(&logname);
04280                         name_destroy(&lovname);
04281                         if (rc) {
04282                                 mutex_unlock(&fsdb->fsdb_mutex);
04283                                 GOTO(out_mti, rc);
04284                         }
04285                 }
04286         }
04287 
04288         rc = name_create(&logname, fsname, "-client");
04289         if (rc) {
04290                 mutex_unlock(&fsdb->fsdb_mutex);
04291                 GOTO(out_mti, rc);
04292         }
04293         if (canceled_label != NULL) {
04294                 rc = mgs_modify(env, mgs, fsdb, mti, logname,
04295                                 fsdb->fsdb_clilov, canceled_label, CM_SKIP);
04296                 if (rc < 0) {
04297                         mutex_unlock(&fsdb->fsdb_mutex);
04298                         name_destroy(&logname);
04299                         GOTO(out_mti, rc);
04300                 }
04301         }
04302 
04303         rc = mgs_write_log_pool(env, mgs, logname, fsdb, fsdb->fsdb_clilov,
04304                                 cmd, fsname, poolname, ostname, label);
04305         mutex_unlock(&fsdb->fsdb_mutex);
04306         name_destroy(&logname);
04307         /* request for update */
04308         mgs_revoke_lock(mgs, fsdb, CONFIG_T_CONFIG);
04309 
04310         EXIT;
04311 out_mti:
04312         if (mti != NULL)
04313                 OBD_FREE_PTR(mti);
04314 out_cancel:
04315         if (canceled_label != NULL)
04316                 OBD_FREE(canceled_label, label_sz);
04317 out_label:
04318         OBD_FREE(label, label_sz);
04319         return rc;
04320 }
